title: Second Glance (Christian Movie)
description:
Second Glance (Christian Movie)

A Rich Christiano film. 

Dan Burgess is a Christian. Dan Burgess thinks he's not impacting anyone for the LORD. Dan Burgess thinks he's missing out on "all the fun". Dan Burgess wants out of the Christian life. Then... one day... Dan Burgess is forced to take a Second Glance. If you are a Christian and you ever wonder whether your walk with the Lord has any impact on anyone at all, this would be a very encouraging movie to watch! The Lord grants this teenager the wish to see the world as it would be if he had never become a Christian. No prayer that he prayed has ever been answered because he was not a Christian to pray them! No person he ever spoke the Bible to has been affected by the Bible, because he was not a Christian to witness to anyone. The outcome will make you look at prayer and your Christian witness in a completely different light. The film shows the impact a true christian and his testimony has on the world. 

Language: English
Subtitles: None
Run Time: 50 minutes
My Rating: 9.5/10
Quality: 9.0/10 

If financially possible, please buy this CD/DVD to keep Christian films in business. If Christians won't buy Christian films then who will?

Please seed. Let each one of us who call ourself Christians seed 2-3 movies each. So that these movies may become a blessing to all those who are hungry for God's word & grace. May Jesus bless all those who are seeding the christian torrents.

"Don't ask me what Christ can do for you! 
He has done all he could. 
Tell me what you can do for Christ?"

Uploaded by Indian Christian
